name: Majid Nawaz
title: Full Stack Developer | Angular • .NET Core • Azure
bio: Full Stack Developer with 10+ years of experience designing and developing enterprise-level applications. Skilled in .NET Core, C#, Angular, SQL Server, Redis, Kafka, GRPC, and Azure. Adept at building scalable, high-performance systems and collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver robust solutions.
about: I'm Majid Nawaz, a Full Stack Developer with over 10 years of experience building enterprise-grade software solutions. My expertise spans Angular, .NET Core, C#, SQL Server, and Azure, with strong focus on performance, scalability, and clean architecture. I’ve led the development of large-scale systems in traffic management, ANPR, and ERP domains — integrating technologies like Redis, Kafka, GRPC, and NGINX to deliver real-time, high-availability applications. I’m passionate about crafting efficient solutions, mentoring teams, and continuously exploring new technologies that enhance reliability and user experience. Currently, I’m working at Traffic Tech Gulf (Qatar), where I build next-generation traffic analytics and monitoring systems.

projects.name: Smart ANPR System (MOI - Qatar)
projects.desc: Advanced plate recognition and monitoring system for the Ministry of Interior, featuring real-time alerts, ArcGIS integration, and online/offline camera monitoring.
projects.stack: .NET Core, Angular, TypeScript, Kafka, Redis, NGINX, SQL Server, ArcGIS

projects.name: Traffic Management Dashboard
projects.desc: Enterprise dashboard displaying live ANPR feeds, transactions, device health, and enforcement analytics for Traffic Tech Gulf.
projects.stack: Angular, .NET Core, Dapper, SQL Server, Redis

projects.name: Tanker Management System (ATTMS)
projects.desc: Comprehensive tanker monitoring and management platform featuring camera integration, plate recognition, and real-time reporting.
projects.stack: .NET Core, MVC, SQL Server, Redis, Kafka

projects.name: PRISM ERP
projects.desc: Full-featured ERP solution with POS, Inventory, Payroll, and Accounting modules, developed for HDK Solutions.
projects.stack: C#, ASP.NET MVC, SQL Server, Kendo UI, Bootstrap, T4 Templates

projects.name: Face Recognition Demo (Azure Pipeline)
projects.desc: AI-driven face detection pipeline using Python for recognition, RabbitMQ for messaging, and .NET Core consumer API for data persistence.
projects.stack: Python, .NET Core, RabbitMQ, SQL Server, Azure

projects.name: Developer Portfolio Site
projects.desc: Personal JSON-driven portfolio built with Angular 20 and TailwindCSS, hosted on Vercel and linked to custom domain.

details: Lead development of enterprise-level traffic and ANPR systems.
Integrated Kafka and GRPC for real-time communication and scalability.
Optimized APIs and database queries using Dapper and Redis.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams and conducted weekly technical reviews.
Maintained high-availability deployments on NGINX and Azure environments.
Developed new modules and optimized legacy systems.
Improved backend performance and implemented new API endpoints.
Contributed to .NET Core service architecture and Angular UI components.
Built ERP applications from scratch using C#, MVC, and SQL Server.
Implemented reusable components and optimized data access layers.
Mentored junior developers and participated in client requirement sessions.
Maintained WebForms applications and implemented new features.
Collaborated with senior developers to deliver timely software updates.
Developed WebForms-based modules and participated in early-stage product development.
Worked with C# and ASP.NET on multiple small-scale applications.
